The ground of a Christians life Deliuered in a sermon at Harwood in Lancashire, the first day of December 1618. By Robert Worthington minister of Gods word at Acceington. Worthington, Robert, minister of Gods word at Acceington.
[8], 76 p.
Printed by R. Field for Robert Mylbourne, and are to be sold at the great south doore of Paules, London : 1620.
Running title reads: Gods word the safest guide. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
